website_summaries.verdict: Adjustable kayak carrier works with all crossbars and all kayak sizes.
pros: Can accommodate kayaks up to 36 inches wide and up to 75 pounds
Comes with a kayak dolly that makes transportation to the water a breeze
Adjustable padding keeps the kayak safe
cons: This rack can be difficult to assemble

customer_reviews.title: 2 Set Roof J rack Kayak Boat Canoe Car SUV top Mount Carrier
customer_reviews.text: Bought this to mount on top of our Honda Odyssey to carrier a 11 ft and 10.5ft kayak. We've been using this for the last for at least every weekend this summer. Through rain and high wind it has held up. I would highly recommend getting a bow/stern tie down. We also used an additional strap to hold the two kayak to the roof mount for piece of mind. Haven't used the dolly at all so its been a waste. Was able to park the van in the garage with this mounted.
customer_reviews.author: Tony L

customer_reviews.title: Just what I needed
customer_reviews.text: For me it was relatively easy to assemble...but it does take time. One of the big negs and why I subtracted a star is that the bolts that hold racks to the crossbar we're too long and had to be cut in order to not hit the roof. Otherwise these works very well ...I have 2 kayaks...one is a double that weighs 72 lbs and another single that only is 25 lbs ...these racks don't even flinch despite the one kayak being close to the max weight limit.
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan H.

customer_reviews.title: You get what you pay for...
customer_reviews.text: This rooftop kayak carrier is cheaply made but holds up for light use. It was one of the few options that don't require a mounted rack which I needed. The contact surfaces on the 4 bases of the rack move under the load of the kayaks and the rubber slips that protect the roof slid out and blew away. 3 stars for holding up at highway speeds without coming loose.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This was an awesome package purchase
customer_reviews.text: This was an awesome package purchase! The J racks fit my cross bars perfectly and the cart is a God sent...helps out so much when I'm taking the kayak to lake by myself! Saves the back!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The cart is a little cheap and it is easier ...
customer_reviews.text: The cart is a little cheap and it is easier to use bungee cords rather than the straps provided.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Junk
customer_reviews.text: The cart is nice and solid. The racks suck! They flex waaaaay too much. Also I have NEVER experienced such garbage nylon lock nuts! Nylon lock nuts are designed not to back off. Where’d they get these?!? I had all 4 nuts back almost completely off of one of the mounts while on the freeway. It swayed the heck out of my car so I pulled off quickly. The mount was seconds from giving up. Could have killed someone.
customer_reviews.author: SomeYoungGuy

customer_reviews.title: This is a good buy.
customer_reviews.text: It took a few minutes to assemble but it works great. Hauled my kayak 400 miles round trip without issues.
customer_reviews.author: Mark Robertson

customer_reviews.title: awesome.  strong.  easy
customer_reviews.text: fits my thule aeroblades perfect. so easy. dolly is amazing. folds fast and small. LOVE this set. going to buy another and give my family the dolly and use the extra racks for more kayaks! I have 47" thule and I can fit 2 if you make the kayak easy to get off by putting the low side to the outside. If you line them all up going the same way, you could get 3 or 2 plus a bike rack up there. assembly was SO EASY and no modification needed.
customer_reviews.author: Brian

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality hardware and difficult to use.
customer_reviews.text: Will not attach to SUV roof rack safely nor securely. One nut and screw stripped during careful assembly. Difficult and time consuming when attaching and detaching from roof rack. Had no problems with the cart.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Does the job. Would buy a folding rack next ...
customer_reviews.text: Does the job. Would buy a folding rack next time due to wind noise and inability to clear garage gate when rack is installed. It takes a while to put it on and off. Definitely taking it off only once a year and parking outside for the warm season.
customer_reviews.author: CheapGeek

customer_reviews.title: Needed modification.
customer_reviews.text: After extensive modification I made these work. I designed a plate to adapt them to my minivan roof rack. I had to use all the pieces so I could carry one kayak. If you think about them as a parts kit they worked awesomely.
customer_reviews.author: Paul Desmarais

customer_reviews.title: Easy to install
customer_reviews.text: Were easy enough to do by myself. They are somewhat crooked now after use and can’t tighten down any further to straighten them out but my kayaks have not fallen off or jiggled so it’s good enough for me
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: The J Racks would be better if the bottom support bracket was as equally wide ...
customer_reviews.text: The J Racks would be better if the bottom support bracket was as equally wide as the top support bracket. Other than that, no problems holding our 12ft 70lb kayak.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan

customer_reviews.title: Great product for my kayaks!
customer_reviews.text: I love these racks for our kayaks. You can put one set on each side of your vehicle and put two kayaks on a mid sized auto easily. I would recommend having specific attachment points but it works really well. I would also recommended front and back tie downs as these don’t come with tie downs
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Martin

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: We easily mount our kayaks onto our car with these racks. Perfect. Don't hesitate to buy.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Good for the price and had all the bolts needed will need crossbars sold separately
customer_reviews.author: Juan rivera

customer_reviews.title: Exactly as ordered
customer_reviews.text: I have been using them all summer without issue. The kayaks are held in place even at highway speeds. The only drawback is that I need to cut a couple of the screws as they are too long for my car.
customer_reviews.author: Joe tirone

customer_reviews.title: Roof J rack Kayak Carrier with 1 Dolly Cart Trailer Carrier Wheels EXCELLENT
customer_reviews.text: Kayak fits properly and secures tightly. The dolly cart works as advertised. Arrived well within promised time and packaging was more than adequate.
customer_reviews.author: John Schmitt

customer_reviews.title: hardware is junk!
customer_reviews.text: will not hold a 40lb kayak. I ended up stacking two of them top down and it was 10X better. also the hardware is junk!
customer_reviews.author: Fifthbc thxxx xxx ndn sCzech xxxAmazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Easy to mount on our H3 Hummer. Held the kayaks firmly.
customer_reviews.author: tundra

customer_reviews.title: Missing peices
customer_reviews.text: Just opened and missing peices and I'm out of my return frame.
customer_reviews.author: murphy

customer_reviews.title: Everything its advertised as
customer_reviews.text: The J Racks were easy to assemble and the cart only took 30 seconds to put together. Very durable cart. Took a 3 hour trip with 3 kayaks on the J Racks with no movement.
customer_reviews.author: Kyle Dobert

customer_reviews.title: Simple and secure
customer_reviews.text: Perfect kayak carrier set. It is easy to assemble and simple to use. It attaches to the rack on my vehicle very quickly and without tools. It is super strong.
customer_reviews.author: Jpz

product_meta.title: 2 Set Roof J rack Kayak Boat Canoe Car SUV top Mount Carrier with 1 Dolly Cart Trailer Carrier Wheels
